definition: bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
Chen Yi (1901-1972), communist general and politician, Marshal of PLA from 1955, Mayor of Shanghai in 1950s, PRC foreign minister 1958-1972
Rong Yiren (1916-2005), PRC Vice President from 1993-1998, played an important role in opening Chinese economy to Western investors
Liu Yi (-285), famous incorruptible official of Western Jin dynasty the Western Jin dynasty 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316)/Liu Yi (-412), general of Eastern Jin dynasty 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420)
story of Liu Yi, Tang fantasy fiction by Li Chaowei 李朝威, popular with dramatist of subsequent dynasties

sentences.english: Noda Take regret the pain, two people fall together.
sentences.chinese: 野田毅後悔痛苦，二人倒在了一起。

sentences.english: “That doesn’t mean the rest of the pixels are useless,” Ma cautions.
sentences.chinese: “這並不意味着其餘的像素是無用的”，馬毅說。

sentences.english: “This,” Ma says, “has opened up all kinds of new opportunities.”
sentences.chinese: “這開拓了各種各樣的新的機遇與可能”，馬毅說道。
樂施會毅行者每年何時舉行？

sentences.english: “We do have a list of priorities,” Ma says.
sentences.chinese: “我們確實有個優先次序列表”，馬毅說。

sentences.english: “Right now, vision is a bottleneck for artificial intelligence,” Ma says.
sentences.chinese: “今天，視覺是人工智能的一個頸瓶”，馬毅說。

sentences.english: Pollinated seeds provide the characteristic nutty taste of dried figs.
sentences.chinese: 授粉種子提供有特色的風味趙毅幹無花果。

sentences.english: When does Oxfam Trailwalker take place every year?
sentences.chinese: 樂施毅行者活動每年什麼時候舉行？

sentences.english: No, Oxfam Trailwalker is not just a physical event.
sentences.chinese: 樂施毅行者不單是一項體力活動。

sentences.english: It is meaningful for us to join Oxfam Trailwalker .
sentences.chinese: 我們參加毅行者活動是有意義的。

sentences.english: Trailwalker is held in Novemrber every year.
sentences.chinese: 毅行者每年十一月份舉行。

sentences.english: Oxfam TrailwakerOxfam Trailwaker has become one of HongKong"s largest charitable activities."
sentences.chinese: 樂施毅行者已成爲香港最大的慈善活動之一。

bow case or scabbard/to hide/military strategy
